Rule.name: Description=ETL files are log files that contain event logs generated by Microsoft Operating System Kernel.

Description=C:\WINDOWS\system32\wuauclt.exe is used for Windows Update. The C:\Windows\SoftwareDistribution folder is a system folder in Windows operating systems that is used to store files related to Windows updates.
